block.p: National League MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Claimed OF Scott Podsednik off waivers from Seattle. Designated RHP Jose Mieses for assignment. Announced LHP Andrew Lorraine refused assignment to Indianapolis and elected free agency.

National Basketball Association PHILDELPHIA 76ERS--Signed C Ron Rollerson. LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS--Waived G Jason Crowe and F James Head. Signed G Larry Reid, F Bennett Davidson and F Eric Chenowith. WASHINGTON WIZARDS--Signed F Charles Oakley to a one-year contract.

National League MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Claimed OF Scott Podsednik off waivers from Seattle. Designated RHP Jose Mieses for assignment. Announced LHP Andrew Lorraine refused assignment to Indianapolis and elected free agency.

National Basketball Association PHILDELPHIA 76ERS--Signed C Ron Rollerson. LOS ANGELES CLIPPERS--Waived G Jason Crowe and F James Head. Signed G Larry Reid, F Bennett Davidson and F Eric Chenowith. WASHINGTON WIZARDS--Signed F Charles Oakley to a one-year contract.

National Hockey League NHL--Suspended Rangers C Eric Lindros one game for a high-stick to the head of Montreal D Stephane Quintal during a game on Oct. 11. WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Recalled G Craig Billington from Portland of the AHL. Sent G Sebastien Charpentier to Portland.
